title: Sump - Inspection

body.body: Ensure the oil pick-up is clean and free of blockages or restrictions. If the oil flow is restricted, oil pressure will be reduced and may cause severe engine damage.
Check the oil pick-up for blockages or restrictions. Remove and clean if found to be blocked or restricted.
